CareTaskDetail.name: CareTaskDetail
CareTaskDetail.description: Represents extra details about a healthcare-related task such as the detail type, detail record, detail code, and detail value.

CareTaskId.description: The care task associated with the care task detail.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of information you're adding to the care task record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the care task detail record.
